Text: RE Witness List Cc ALJ Biren PGE intends to offer one exhibit the direct testimony of Richard Hall no exhibit number has as yet been assigned As to cross examination estimates PGE at this time estimates approximately minutes each for Mr Morgan of Kern River Mr Weaver of El Paso and Mr Lorenz of SoCalSDGE Ed Kurz From Norman A PedersenSMTP Sent Tuesday May PM To Cc Kurz Edward Law Subject Witness List This message and any attachments are intended for the individual or entity named above If you are not the intended recipient please do not read copy use or disclose this communication to others also please notify the sender by replying to this message and then delete it from your system Thank you In accordance with paragraph of your Ruling dated April the supporters of the PostInterim Settlement provide the following witness list Michel Peter Florio James Weil and Catherine E Yap The prepared direct testimony of these witnesses has been premarked as Exhibit The prepared rebuttal testimony of these witnesses has been premarked as Exhibit
